overview:
Mere Noonan is an entrepreneur who’s most recent project is “The Mere Idea”, a start up company aimed at sharing entrepreneurial experiences.

She started as a web developer at TheAcademy.com, a small technology company that provided custom learning solutions to large national clients. After a short time she was promoted to Director of Development over seeing all production projects. Her hands on approach and exceptional customer care earned her many accolades. A year later she was promoted to Vice President of Technology and embarked on a product overhaul which provided the company with a more relevant technological offering. She continued to oversee most development projects and began to focus on sales and growth of the company. A year after later, she was promoted to Vice President of Sales and Marketing in an effort to boost sales of the new product line. Finally, she was promoted to Senior Vice President, overseeing most critical areas of the company.

In 2010, she parted ways amicably with the company in pursuit of her own endeavors.
